To install a package on Ubuntu 24.04.1 LTS, use the following command:                              

                                                                                                    
 sudo apt-get update && sudo apt-get install <package_name>                                         
                                                                                                    

Replace <package_name> with the name of the package you want to install. For example, if you want to
install Apache2, use:                                                                               

                                                                                                    
 sudo apt-get update && sudo apt-get install apache2                                                
                                                                                                    

To check the version of a package installed on your system, use:                                    

                                                                                                    
 dpkg -l | grep <package_name>

prompt: how to install ollama in ubuntu ??
response:
To install Ollama on Ubuntu 24.04.1 LTS, you'll first need to add its repository and then install it using apt. Here
are the steps:                                                                                                      

                                                                                                                    
 wget -qO - https://ollamaproject.org/keys/ollama-archive-key.asc | sudo apt-key add -                              
 echo "deb [arch=amd64 signed-by=/etc/apt/trusted.gpg.d/ollama-archive-key.asc] https://ollamaproject.org/apt ollam 
 main" | sudo tee /etc/apt/sources.list.d/ollama.list                                                               
 sudo apt update && sudo apt install ollama                                                                         
                                                                                                                    

After installation, you can start using Ollama according to its documentation.
